Road, Sub: Guidelines/Norms for access pemission to Fuel Stations, Private Properties, Rest Area Complexes ad such other facilitles National Highways. Sir , In continuation to Ministry's Circular of even No. dated the July, 2013 on the subject   captioned above, the_following clarificetion is issued in pursuance of Para 14 (Page 4) of this Circular: Para 14 shall read as 'The appeals against the actions of Highway Administration shall be entertained by the   respective National Highways Zobznal notified under the Control of National Highways (Landna Trafc)ACE 2002. The contents of this Circular may please be brought to the notice of all the concerned in your Organization This Circular issues with the approval of competent authority.
